text: Check out the rest of @AP Seafood from Slaves investigation - including amazing photos, video and follow-ups from @estherhtusan11 @MargieMasonAP @mendozamartha @robinmcdowell @DitaAlangkara @tassanee #narrativeBU
author: marinav13

text: .@robinmcdowell says following the stories, fishing companies can’t deny exploitation is happening now. Greater awareness among sea food, pet food consumers as well. >2k slaves freed. But still 10s of 1000s of men on fishing boats, she says. #narrativeBU
author: marinav13

text: .⁦@robinmcdowell⁩ says she’s never satisfied w/ her writing, & says writing she’s least satisfied w/ may be this @ap investigation about global supermarkets selling shrimp peeled by slaves. She keeps thinking of what didn’t make article #narrativeBU
author: marinav13

text: At #narrativeBU this weekend! Fair warning: expect excited tweets about narrative journalism and the surprisingly decent bagels.
author: marinav13
